title: Giant bat

properties.name: description
properties.value: Giant Bats are relatively low-level flying monsters found at a number of locations in RuneScape. Despite them being generally weak monsters they may sometimes pose a threat to players due to their aggressiveness toward any players level 54 or lower. Giant bats can be used as a slightly higher-level alternative for regular Bats for Slayer assignments.

Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page

Giant Bats are relatively low-level flying monsters found at a number of locations in RuneScape. Despite them being generally weak monsters they may sometimes pose a threat to players due to their aggressiveness toward any players level 54 or lower. Giant bats can be used as a slightly higher-level alternative for regular Bats for Slayer assignments.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100%
    • 2.2 Tertiary
  • 3 Drops (Brine Rat Cavern and Arceuus)
    • 3.1 100%
  • 4 Changes
    • 4.1 Gallery (historical)

  1. ^ Giant bat wings are only dropped during the Rag and Bone Man I. The giant bats located in the Brine Rat Cavern and Arceuus do not drop this.
  2. ^ Looting bags are only dropped by those found in the Wilderness.
